name: zkverifyjs
description: Submit proofs to zkVerify and query proof state with ease using our npm package.
author: Horizen Labs <research@horizenlabs.io>

scripts.pack-and-install: npm run build && npm pack && rm -rf node_modules/zkverifyjs && npm install ./$(npm pack | tail -n 1) --no-save
scripts.bump-version: npm version $npm_config_level && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: bump version to $npm_package_version' && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push origin --tags && npm run build
scripts.test:file:coverage: node -e 'const path = process.argv[1]; require("child_process").execSync(`npx jest --coverage --collectCoverageFrom="${path}/index.ts" ${path}/index.test.ts`, { stdio: "inherit" });' --
